title: Peloton Seeks Minority Investment to Shore Up Business
sub_head: Fitness company is pursuing potential investors that could take stake of around 15% to 20%, sources say
body:
Peloton Interactive Inc. is exploring a sale of a sizable minority stake, in an effort to shore up its business as the once-hot bike makerâ€™s stock continues to sink.
The fitness company is targeting potential investors including industry players and private-equity firms that could take a stake of around 15% to 20%, according to people familiar with the matter. Discussions are at an early stage and there are no guarantees the New York-based company will find a taker or agree to a deal.
